DOC.brief_summary: The aim of study is to determine effect of enhanced recovery after surgery (ERAS) on inflammatory response after abdominal hysterectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) on Inflammatory Response After Planned Abdominal Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Abdominal hysterectomy ASA class I or II psychiatric disorders ASA III and IV Chronic inflammatory disorders Pregnancy Local anesthetics allergy Coagulation disorders patients receiving anticoagulants
